title: Fabulous 2 bed / 2 bath, 1043 Sq Feet in a prime location!
posting_body: ['Brooks Crossing Apartments', '8050 Taylor Road', 'Riverdale, GA 30274', 'A wonderful home in Riverdale is waiting for you!', 'We currently have a gorgeous 2 bedroom 2 bathroom renting for $1532 per month.', 'This unit comes with 1043 sq ft.', 'We are also just a few miles from major interstates and a short commute to Downtown Atlanta.', 'We invite you to call us for more information or come by Brooks Crossing Apartments and see why our residents love to call us home!', 'We look forward to showing you around our community.', 'show contact info', 'Community Highlights:', '➢ Clubhouse', '➢ Courtyard', '➢ Fitness Center', '➢ Gated', '➢ Maintenance on site', '➢ Picnic Areas', '➢ Playground', '➢ Smoke Free', '➢ Sparkling Pool', '➢ Wi-Fi at Pool and Clubhouse', '➢ Covered Parking', '➢ Laundry Facilities', '➢ Monthly Resident Events', '➢ Multi Use Room', '➢ Online Services', '➢ Package Service', '➢ Preferred Employer Discounts Available', '➢ Resident Referral Bonuses', '➢ Sports Courts', '➢ Tennis Court', 'Unit Highlights:', '➢ Air Conditioning', '➢ Cable Ready', '➢ Ceiling Fans', '➢ Deck', '➢ Dishwasher', '➢ Disposal', '➢ Fireplace', '➢ Freezer', '➢ Heating', '➢ High Speed Internet Access', '➢ Range', '➢ Refrigerator', '➢ Tub/Shower', '➢ Vaulted Ceilings', '➢ Walk-In Closets', '➢ Washer/Dryer Hookup', '➢ Wi-Fi', '➢ Window Coverings', 'Contact:', 'show contact info', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Leasing Options:', '6-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Pet Policy:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'Management:', 'Ventron Management', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'D6C0C42A524340']
